amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of amendments Nos. 62, 64, 70, 72, 73, 76, 81, 82, 88, 90, 99, 101, and 112 contained in House Report 112-485 and printed on pages H3126-H3129 of the Congressional Record for May 18, 2012.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 112-485: Nos. 62, 64, 70, 72, 73, 76, 81, 82, 88, 90, 91, 99, 101, 112, and 130.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A040) offered by Mr. McKeon.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
